title: Power Lunch costs $19 and served in 45 minutes
statement: Kona Grill's Power Lunch is a 3-course meal for $19, served in 45 minutes, available weekdays 11AM-2PM.

citations.quote: the Kona Grill Power Lunch – a 3-course meal for just $19, served in 45 minutes, guaranteed... Available from 11AM – 2PM, Monday – Friday
